title: AOTU Shijie Reborn
synopsis:
The Creator of Aotu World is a reckless God who created a universe full of inequality, but also gave the people a chance to change their destiny- Just participate in the "Aotu Tournament" and utilize the "Special Abilities" granted by the system. Pass rounds of cruel tests and strive for the ultimate victory! Now, the tournament, which has been suspended for 100 years, has been reopened.

Our protagonist, King, decides to enter the tournament in order to change the fate of his planet, Dengru, and find his sister...
